divs: sighting detailsi was driving home @ around 10:15 p.m. last night 1\1\2012 on i-75 heading northbound. when i was 1 mile south of the miami gardens drive exit i looked up and there were 10-13 red orange orbs hovering stationary over the road about what seemed to be 100 miles up. at first i thought they were red paper lanterns, but it was clear to me after observing them for several seconds that they were not anything common. others had pulled over to look @ theses things. i wanted to call the fhp offive in "plantation" to report them and to find out if anyone else had seen them. instead i came online to find where i could report this sighting. please let me know if anyone else has reported this. it happened and it was real. i am a healthy 35 year old male with no history if insanity or phsycological issues. this was real. this is the first time i have seen this with my own eyes. what is going here? if there are government experiments or actual ufos we need to be told. this was real. i do not have a cell phone so i could not take any pictures, but others had pulled over to look at them so i'm hoping they had taken pictures of these red orange orbs. i hope you have recieved other reports such as mine. again...this happened last night @ around 10:15 p.m. over i-75 (northbound) 1 mile before "miami gardens drive" exit. i wrote the number of witnesses to be 7. there were others pulled on the side of the road but i cannot give you an exact number, i did not pull over. i drove in slow lane looking up @ these orbs and noticed other cars pulled off to the side and peopel looking observing.
Summary: Driving home on I-75 @ around 10:15 p.m. About 10-13 Red orange orbs about 100 ft above I-75 before 1 mile before you arrive @ Miami Gardens drive exit. "Believe it!!!" Other pepole had pulled over to look @ them. It was real!!!!!
